title: Ralph UI doesn't exit properly and ignores keyboard input
description: Ralph UI has two related issues: (1) It doesn't exit when all stories complete - hangs indefinitely instead of showing summary and waiting for keypress. (2) Keyboard input like 'q' and Ctrl+C are ignored or don't work reliably to exit the UI.

acceptanceCriteria.text: When all stories complete, Ralph shows completion summary (stories completed, time elapsed, errors)
After showing summary, Ralph waits for any keypress before exiting
Pressing 'q' at any time during execution cleanly exits Ralph
Ctrl+C (SIGINT) cleanly exits Ralph at any point
Exit cleanup removes ~/.ralph-status and any temp files
Gum fallback supports exit behavior if capable (nice-to-have)
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
Commit: fix: BUG-013 Ralph UI exit and keyboard handling
